task_summary: Place the already-held white box down onto the table surface and retreat safely.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator must place a white box onto the table. The object appears among cans and bottles on a curved tabletop. The robot is assumed to already be holding the white box. The behavior ensures a controlled approach above the placement zone, a gentle press to seat the object, gripper release, and a short retreat to avoid collisions. Timeouts and minimum press force are conservative to prevent knocking nearby items.
preconditions: White box is grasped and stable in the gripper
Table area has enough free space to place the object
Robot reachable workspace includes the target area
Perception provides a nominal place region on the table
stepwise_plan: Verify the object is in the gripper.
Move to a pose above the table placement region.
Place on surface with low force and nominal yaw.
Open gripper to release the box.
Retreat vertically to clear the object.
success_criteria: White box rests stably on the table without sliding
End-effector returns to a clear, safe pose
failure_and_recovery: If object not detected in gripper: abort and request a pick routine
If contact is unstable or obstruction occurs: retreat and reattempt placement
If release fails: reopen gripper and gently jiggle by re-placing with minimal force
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after successful placement and retreat to a safe distance.

frame_3.now_evidence: Arm is aligned above the right-side placement zone; neighboring objects visible for context.
frame_3.predicts_next: Lowering/placing followed by gripper release should occur.

node_specs.description: Ensure the white box is currently held.
Go to a pre-place pose above the table region.
Place the held box on the table with minimal force.
Back off to a safe clearance pose.

failure_modes: Collision with nearby items during descent
recovery_strategy: Abort to pick routine if object missing
Retry with higher approach height and slower descent
Re-grasp and re-place if slip detected
Shift place location slightly and reattempt
assumptions: Frames suggest approaching the right-side area; the white box is assumed to be the held object though it is small/low-contrast in some tiles.
Instruction implies the object is already grasped; no pick step included.

expected_success_criteria: Box rests flat on table; gripper clears; no disturbance to neighbors
